definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: No one should be alone in their old age, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不該上了年紀獨個兒待着，他想。

sentences.english: Is it at all possible that he alone can drink ten bottles of beer?
sentences.chinese: 難道他真的能獨個兒飲十瓶啤酒嗎？

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 獨個的山地大猩猩從來不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: I hate to see you standing about by youself in this stupid manner.
sentences.chinese: 我可不願意看到你獨個兒這麼傻里傻氣的站在這。

sentences.english: If you travel alone in that forest, you may run into danger.
sentences.chinese: 如果你獨個兒在那片森林裏行走，你會遇到危險的。

sentences.english: There was no room for details that were to be viewed as individual elements.
sentences.chinese: 細節不應被視作獨個的元素。

sentences.english: In his present frame of mind he shouldn't be left alone.
sentences.chinese: 在他目前的這種心情下，不該讓他獨個兒留着。

sentences.english: He immediately let go of his hands and sleep in bed singly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻放開手，獨個兒上牀睡覺。

sentences.english: I hate to see you standing about by yourself in this stupid manner.
sentences.chinese: 我不願看到你獨個兒這麼傻里傻氣地站在這兒。

sentences.english: I hate to be alone in the house, but I dare not go out alone after dark. ;
sentences.chinese: 我討厭獨個兒呆在家，但天黑後我又不敢一個人出去。

sentences.english: I love staying with friends, instead of staying alone.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡跟朋友一起，而不喜歡獨個兒。

sentences.english: One little nigger boy living all alone…
sentences.chinese: 一個小黑人獨個兒過活。

sentences.english: I went to the Grand Canyon a couple of weeks ago ALONE.
sentences.chinese: 幾個星期前，我獨個兒去了大峽谷。

sentences.english: Of course, you might not have a whole room of your own to work in.
sentences.chinese: 當然，你可能沒有自己工作的獨個房間。

sentences.english: After he passed the exam, Mr. A was cheerfully hum-ming(songs)to himself.
sentences.chinese: 考試通過後，A先生獨個兒喜悅地自哼歌曲。
